On Sun, Sep 23, 2012 at 12:27:56AM -0000, nfoscarini wrote:
> I'm having trouble reading a compressed archive made with Heritrix 1.14
> 
> The first record appears to read fine, but the next call to i.hasNext() generates this error.
> 
> WARNING Record ENDING at 504083 has 2279416 trailing byte(s): IAH-20120922194513-00000-Avatar-80.arc.gz: {length=1289, content-type=text/plain, ip-address=0.0.0.0, creation-date=20120922194513, absolute-offset=0, subject-uri=filedesc://IAH-20120922194513-00000-Avatar-80.arc, version=1.1}

Running on java7? Try running with java6.
Oracle upgraded the Behaviour of GZIpInputstream in java7, this breaks
at least Heritrix 2.

There is a Bug report for this, requesting a fallback to the old
behaviour, but I cannot find it atm... 

Stefan
